name: What's the Time, Jack?
description:
Want to test your time-telling knowledge? Want to do it against the clock, and aim for a high score?

The What's the Time, Jack? is perfect for you!

  • Choose from two different clocks: 12 hour and 24 hour
  • Compete for the high score!
  • Marvel at the four different colours used!
  • Listen to the music!
